title: Jacey, Fynn & Aden
description: Months ago, Fynn got into Jacey's face in the most unnerving of ways. Now they have to work together every day on the dingo shifters' ranch. Jacey can't forget that first encounter, and desperately fights the attraction he feels for Fynn and Fynn's mate, Aden. Fynn and Aden want Jacey to come to them willingly--but patience has its limits, and Jacey pushes too far when he drives home drunk after a night at the local bar. It's time to show Jacey what a mate bond really means, and maybe Jacey has a few things to show his shifters, too...
author: Nerine Petros
